item.title: SFU CS/ SoSy Transfer Guide
item.description: Introduction Hello! My name is Brian. I have just transferred to Simon Fraser University’s Software Systems program this summer after graduating from Langara with an Associate in Computer Science. In this guide, I will show you all the knowledge that I have accumulated to successfully transfer to Simon Fraser University (CS/ SoSy). You can also check out this guide for the UBC version. My guide here is mainly intended for Langara College students aiming to transfer to SFU.
